entry.title: [Octopress] How to setup your octopress blog on a new computer
entry.content:
What is the problem?

You are most likely to encouter some error when you try to clone your octopress repo onto a new computer and make a post.

How to fix it?

Here is a fix to that. You need to create and link the _deploy directory to master branch.

  1. Clone the repo, switch to the source branch. bash git clone https://github.com/username/username.github.io.git git checkout source
  2. set up the _deploy directory, and link it to the master branch bash mkdir _deploy cd _deploy git init git remote add -t master -f origin https://github.com/username/username.github.io.git
